filename-lint.namingPattern:
Specify file naming conventions.
- Custom regex pattern. (Example: `^[^A-Z]+$`)
- Or use preset patterns:
  - **lowercase**: `^[^A-Z]+$`
  - **kebab-case**: `^[a-z0-9]+(-[a-z0-9]+)*$`
  - **snake_case**: `^[a-z0-9]+(_[a-z0-9]+)*$`
  - **camelCase**: `^[a-z0-9]+[a-z0-9]*([A-Z][a-z0-9]*)*$`
  - **PascalCase**: `^[A-Z]+[a-z0-9]*([A-Z0-9][a-z0-9]*)*$`
filename-lint.excludePatterns:
Specify files to exclude.
- It need to use [glob syntax](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/glob-patterns)
- Default: `["**/.git/**", "**/.idea/**", "**/node_modules/**"]`
filename-lint.includePatterns:
Specify files to include.
- It need to use [glob syntax](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/glob-patterns)
- Default: `["**/**"]`
filename-lint.invalid-file-name: File name does not match the naming conventions: {0}
filename-lint.invalid-dir-name: Directory name does not match the naming conventions: {0}
filename-lint.deprecated.customRegex: This setting has been merged into "filename-lint.namingPattern"
